description: The file is a comprehensive Dart source code for a Flutter-based calculator frontend app. It includes theme definitions, UI layout with animated components, and calculator logic with state management.

classes.name: OceanPalette
classes.description: Defines a custom dark color palette for the calculator app with vibrant and subtle shades.

classes.name: CalculatorApp
classes.description: Root widget that sets up theme and routing for the calculator application.

classes.name: CalculatorHomePage
classes.description: Stateful widget managing the calculator's display and input logic.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point that runs the CalculatorApp.

methods.name: _buildTheme
methods.description: Constructs the custom dark Material theme for the application.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the MaterialApp widget with theme and home page.

methods.name: _CalculatorHomePageState
methods.description: State class managing input, calculation, and display for the calculator.

methods.name: onInput
methods.description: Handles digit and decimal point input.

methods.name: onEquals
methods.description: Performs calculation and updates display when '=' is pressed.

methods.name: onBackspace
methods.description: Removes the last digit from current input.

methods.name: onToggleSign
methods.description: Toggles the sign of the current number.

methods.name: _calculate
methods.description: Performs basic arithmetic between two doubles based on the operator.
